data.name: Level Zero
data.detailed_description:
What is LEVEL ZERO?

LEVEL ZERO is a tactical online multiplayer first-person horror game where the first team of players, represented by survivors, must repair the space station's light controls and restore power to eliminate the hostile creatures. The second team of players, represented by the dangerous, monstrous creatures, must prevent the repairs of the station systems, or neutralize all survivors using a variety of telepathic abilities. The survivors on the space station must use a variety of devices, light sources, and other items to defend themselves against the hostile creatures and avoid total darkness. On a grim space station that has suffered an energetic disaster, the survivors will have to look for access codes, key cards, and other ways to open doors to pave a safe path to the station's breakdown systems. Monster players can see well in the dark and move around the ventilation shafts. They must explore the station, find artefacts to replenish their energy, and beware of bright light using many of their telepathic abilities to help neutralise electronics and the survivors crew. Monsters will set up ambushes, attack in unexpected moments and enjoy the advantage of seeing in the dark!

Game Lor

September 17, 2058. Our space expedition to explore new horizons of the universe was coming to an end. We stopped on a planet that caught our attention by something bizarre... Something perhaps unbelievable. This absolutely amazing phenomenon. The entire planet was surrounded by gloomy clouds, turning the whole sky pitch black. Despite this abnormality, we still found life on this uncharted world. And so, we took soil samples, collected data, and set course back home. But on the way, something... Something happened... Something we did NOT expect... Communication on the space station was just completely cut off. And our power systems, well... They all began to fail. The station plunged into, what I can only call, pure darkness.. But that wasn't the end of our nightmares... It was just the beginning.

Game Features:

  • Play alone or with friends against other real players in an asymmetrical 4v2 mode.
  • Large, dark and detailed game location to explore
  • Atmospheric graphics that can scare any player
  • A system of randomization of items and screamers, which will make each round a unique horror experience
  • Immersive sound design that captures the entire atmosphere of a gloomy and destroyed space station
  • Unique mechanics of physical light affecting the environment

Future plans for the Release version of the game after Early Acces:

  • New game mod "Mafia" like Among Us
  • Map Expansion/New Locations based on earth
  • New and improved male and female characters, as well as new monsters
  • New character animations
  • More random events and screamers to improve the atmosphere
  • Leaderboard/Player Rating System
  • Skins for monsters and human survivors
  • Many new telepathic possibilities for monsters to choose from
  • Improving user interface, menu, lobby
  • Lots of new survival gadgets for humans
  • More possibilities of interaction with the station environment

data.short_description: LEVEL ZERO is a tactical online first-person horror game where survivоrs must repair the space station and defend themselves with various devices, while a team of monsters must prevent the station from being repaired, or neutralise all survivоrs using their telepathic powers while avoiding light.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
